t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using Yiisonger Power Banks Due to Fire and Burn Hazards; Risk of Serious Injury or Death; Sold on Amazon.com | CPSC.gov
s: The defective power banks were sold in black, blue, misty blue, purple and white. The brand name “Yiisonger” is printed on the front and the model number “KT-D007” is printed on the side. About 93,000 defective power banks were sold on Amazon.com from April 2022 through February 2025 ...
